SESSION_ID.description: Put yorr SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with XBOT-MD~ or get session id from here, https://davex-seasion.onrender.com

MODE.description: Bot mode can be: public, private, inbox, or group (all lowercase). public: everyone can use the bot. private: only owner and bot itself. inbox: only in private chat by owner/bot. group: only in groups by users, but bot/owner can use it anywhere.

ANTI_BAD.description: Set true to Automatically deletes bad commands sent by users and warns them To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ANTI_LINK.description: Set true to Deletes messages containing links and warns the user To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)
